ygData.subject: Re: wizard class
ygData.msgSnippet: Eheheh i just thinned a same and i wished to write a letter to our list to ask a same question. I see that other groups are much better organized and they have
ygData.messageBody:
Eheheh i just thinned a same and i wished to write a letter to our list to
ask a same question. I see that other groups are much better organized and
they have also members of Verant reading their forums. Here all talk about
other things and none wish to talk about real problems of our class, spell
improvement threads are lost in really stupid thread about twinkling which
can find its place in everquest list not in one list which idea is to talk
about problems of Wizards and not balancing of all game.


I read some excellent ideas in previous posts on this list but do you send
email to EQmail@... about things which you would like to see in game?

Think what impresion one can take of our list if he takes a casual look ??

Horrifying!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Twinking ... xxxxxxxxx

and other inappropriate posts which fill my mailbox without bringing any
fresh ideas only lamentation!

Sorry for a long letter but i really wish to see in this list some long
thread about new spells, about how shadow step can be made better, or
anything other but a twinkling subject which can easily transfer to
everquest list or cheats list.

And only what i see is that many strange individuals like to combat any new
idea which somebody propose.




At 03.05 25/05/99 -0400, you wrote:
>From: Partymind@...
>
>I know there was an Argument about this before but it is starting to bother
>me a little. It seems that all the classes are getting updated except the
>wizard class. Could someone please give me news that the Eq people didn't
>forget about us wizards.
>
>Parthon lvl 12
>
>------------------------------------------------------------------------
>Give back to your community through "Grow to Give."
>http://www.ONElist.com
>See homepage for details.



Silverion
High elf wizard (against all statistics eheheeh)
Fenin Ro

http://www.tip.it/wizard

moderator mailto:_EQ_magic@onelist.com
